laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: von Willebrand factor antigen and ristocetin cofactor activity
laboratory_examinations.findings: Low level of von Willebrand factor antigen and ristocetin cofactor activity.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient's bleeding time improved from 10 minutes to 7 minutes with administration of desmopressin.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Prothrombin gene mutation (20210 G to A) identified.
Intradermal abscess with granulomatous inflammation of foreign body type. No caseation or necrobiosis.
